entries.title: The Far Side comic 1 for June 12, 2024
The Far Side comic 2 for June 12, 2024

summary.caption: “Lunch is ready, Lawrence, and … what? You’re still a fly?”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 3 for June 12, 2024

summary.caption: “Good heavens, Mr. Farley, is that the end of someone’s nose I see down there?”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 4 for June 12, 2024

summary.caption: “Listen—just take one of our brochures and see what we’re all about. … In the meantime, you may wish to ask yourself, ‘Am I a happy cow?’”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 5 for June 12, 2024

summary.caption: “I’ve got it, too, Omar … a strange feeling like we’ve just been going in circles.”
